attr.title: Tricky Keys
attr.desc: Your computer has been infected! Go through level to level platforming and solving puzzles with a Virus looming over your shoulder, restricting your movement and even outright taking control!
attr.desc_md:
Your computer has been infected! Go through level to level platforming and solving puzzles with a Virus looming over your shoulder, restricting your movement and even outright taking control!

**Features:**
- 30+ Levels which take advantage of unique mechanics
- A handful of obstacles and enemies
- 3 Worlds that throw you deeper into your PC
- An original soundtrack
- Quality 2D Pixel art graphics

**Controls:**
WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar - Jump
attr.inst: This port is ready to run, thanks to Team Bugulon granting us permission to distribute this game.
